options.content:
Water Tank & Pumping Rate Errors ${location}

0 = no error
1 = water tank weight increase but no overall positive pumping rate
2 = water tank weight decrease but no overall negative pumping rate
3 = tank weight stagnation even though negative or positive pumping rate

targets.query:
import "join"
import "strings"
import "date"

pumpRate = from(bucket: "lysimeter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "raw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^L_[1-6]_PUC_S_NEG/ or r["_field"] =~ /^L_[1-6]_PUC_S_POS/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${location}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["schedule"] == "H")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with lysi: strings.substring(v: r._field, start:2, end:3)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: if r["_field"] =~  /^L_[1-6]_PUC_S_NEG/ then "rate_neg" else "rate_pos"}))
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_value","_time","location","lysi"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time","location","lysi"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")

waterWeight = from(bucket: "lysimeter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "raw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^L_[1-6]_WAG_D_000$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${location}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["schedule"] == "I")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with lysi: strings.substring(v: r._field, start:2, end:3)}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "weight"}))
  |> group(columns: ["lysi"])
  |> difference(columns: ["_value"], keepFirst: true, initialZero: true)
  |> group(columns: ["location","lysi","_field"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> keep(columns: ["_field","_value","_time","location","lysi"])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time","location","lysi"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> group(columns: ["location"])

join.left(
    left: pumpRate, 
    right: waterWeight, 
    on: (l, r) => l._time == r._time and l.lysi == r.lysi,
    as: (l, r) => ({l with weight: r.weight})
)
|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with Lysimeter: if r.weight>0 and (r.rate_neg-r.rate_pos)<=0 then 1 
                    else if r.weight<0 and (r.rate_pos-r.rate_neg)<=0 then 2 
                    else if (r.weight >= -0.05 and r.weight <= 0.05) and (r.rate_pos >= 0.05 or r.rate_neg >= 0.05) then 3
                    else 0}))
|> drop(columns: ["rate_pos","rate_neg","weight","location"])
|> group(columns: ["lysi"])
|> timeShift(duration: -1439m)
//|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with date_str: "${date.year(t:r._time)}-${if strings.strlen(v: string(v: date.month(t: r._time))) < 2 then "0${date.month(t: r._time)}" else string(v: date.month(t: r._time))}-${if strings.strlen(v: string(v: date.monthDay(t: r._time))) < 2 then "0${date.month(t: r._time)}" else string(v: date.monthDay(t: r._time))}"}))

import "date"
import "strings"

from(bucket: "lysimeter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "flags")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${location}")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with code: r._value}))
  |> group(columns: ["_field","schedule","code"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1d, fn: count, column: "_value")
  |> timeShift(duration: 1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with code_ng: r.code}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field_ng: r._field}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with schedule_ng: r.schedule}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: date.sub(from: r._time, d: 1d)}))
  //|> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: "${date.year(t:r._time)}-${date.month(t:r._time)}-${date.monthDay(t:r._time)}"}))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: "${date.year(t:r._time)}-${if strings.strlen(v: string(v: date.month(t: r._time))) < 2 then "0${date.month(t: r._time)}" else string(v: date.month(t: r._time))}-${if strings.strlen(v: string(v: date.monthDay(t: r._time))) < 2 then "0${date.month(t: r._time)}" else string(v: date.monthDay(t: r._time))}"}))
  |> drop(columns: ["schedule","_field","code"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: r._field_ng}))
  |> drop(columns: ["_field_ng"])

from(bucket: "lysimeter")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "raw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^L_[1-6]_TS1_M_140$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${location}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["schedule"] == "H")
  |> drop(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["schedule"] == "H")
  |> drop(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "raw")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] =~ /^L_[1-6]_PUC_S_NEG/ or r["_field"] =~ /^L_[1-6]_PUC_S_POS/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["location"] == "${location}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["schedule"] == "H")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: if r["_field"] =~  /^L_[1-6]_PUC_S_NEG/ then -1.0*r["_value"] else r["_value"]}))
